item.title: Blocked drain, 6th July
item.description:

item.title: Metal Hoop needs to be reset in ground, 6th July
item.description:
Dear Sir or Madam, The council owned metal hoop on the council owned verge adjacent to 23 Ampleforth Road, SE2 9BD (photo attached) needs to be reset in the ground. (This has only happened in the last day or so and it looks like someone may have tried to pull it out of the ground!) Kind regards

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sewell Road, Thamesmead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Passing vehicles causing a "thumping" noise sound, 6th July
item.description:
The main road surface in Welbeck Avenue is separate giant slabs of solid concrete with some tarmac intermixed. Over the last few days I have noticed a loud thudding noise as vehicles pass along especially outside our house and I am concerned that something more serious is going to happen and this probably requires a structural engineer to examine what is happening. Are these slabs of concrete now moving and likely to cause some heave to the overall safety of the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Welbeck Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Before the traffic light black bin, 6th July
item.description:
Sorry this smell is dirty smell is killing me and everyone is been there for long time over three years I can't believe it no one report this or make complaint u have to come and see the smell from this black bin

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 34B, Blomfield Road, Paddington, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Numerous deep potholes along Burnt oak lane Sidcup, 6th July
item.description:
Along the stretch of Burnt Oak Lane where the entrance to Chatsworth Infants School is situated there are numerous potholes of which some are quite dangerous and likely to damage cars. This whole stretch need to be relaid in it's entirety
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hurst Road, Albany Park, Sidcup, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Traffic bollards on pavement, 6th July
item.description:
These traffic bollards have been on the pavement for several months and they encourage people to fly tip on against the wall of my property - please can you remove these and also use more enforcement on fly tipping on this street as its getting out of hand

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Powell Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
